Einzig die Anzahl der Speicherslots und der Epilog nach dem Endkampf wurden eingefügt, was eine weitere kleine Storyänderung zur Folge hatte. Des Weiteren kamen weitere Sprachsamples und Zwischensequenzen hinzu, woraus auch die insgesamt drei Spiel-CDs resultieren.

Volte para o mundo encantador de Lunar! Junte-se a Hiro e Ruby 1.000 anos após a primeira aventura, enquanto eles trabalham para desvendar os segredos da Blue Spire e da jovem estranha que encontraram dentro dela! Mas tenha cuidado! Forças estão no trabalho tentando reviver o mal Zofar e mergulhar Lunar na escuridão para sempre! Viaje para terras distantes em busca da Deusa Althena, que pode ser a única poderosa o suficiente para parar Zofar. Ao longo do caminho, você conhecerá personagens novos e emocionantes, lutará com monstros totalmente animados, atravessará picos cobertos de neve e rastejará por calabouços escorregadios enquanto você trabalha em direção ao clímax aterrorizante!

locale.title: Lunar: The Silver Star
locale.synopsis: Welcome to the world of Lunar, where dragons yet live and magic is valued above all else. Join Alex, the young adventurer as he begins a quest with his friends to save their land from the crushing advances of the Magic Emperor. Explore dungeons, fight terrifying monsters, and gather information from the locals as you advance toward the explosive confrontation with the Magic Emperor himself! Exciting, menu-driven combat will keep you challenged until the last. And thanks to the storage power of the CD, Lunar contains awesome animation sequences that'll get you involved in the story -- fast! Get ready for the ride of your life...

El héroe de "Lunar: The Silver Star" es Alex, un joven cuyo ideal es el gran guerrero del pasado, Dragonmaster Dyne. Pero con el fin de convertirse en un Dragonmaster, Alex tiene que encontrar los cuatro grandes dragones para que le concedan el permiso. La chica Luna, de quien Alex está enamorado, lo acompaña en su viaje. Pero pronto los jóvenes descubren que algo, o alguien, está tratando de cambiar la faz del mundo con la resurrección de la antigua diosa Althena, con Luna siendo un elemento clave en el plan.
"Lunar: The Silver Star" es un RPG estilo japonés tradicional con batallas por turnos. Los personajes de tu grupo tienen atributos de clase diferentes (guerrero, sacerdote, el usuario de magia, etc.). Es posible mover los personajes en el campo de batalla, cosa que a veces puede resultar de importancia estratégica (por ejemplo, la difusión de los personajes para evitar ser golpeados por un hechizo de área).

Lunar : The Silver Star sur Mega CD est un jeu de rôle dans lequel on incarne Alex, un garçon qui rêve de devenir DragonMaster à l'instar de son idole, le légendaire Dyne. Avec ses amis Nall et Luna, le jeune homme se lance en quête des quatre dragons. Les combats se déroulent en tour par tour et chaque victoire permet au héros d'acquérir des points d'expérience, et par la même occasion de gagner de nouvelles attaques spéciales.

Lunar: Silver Star Story Complete ist eine Neuauflage des Spiels Lunar: The Silver Star, welches erstmals im Jahre 1992 auf dem Sega CD in Japan erschien. Auf dem Weg in die SuempfeIm Jahre 1993, also genau ein Jahr nach der Erstveröffentlichung, wurde es von Working Designs auch in den USA vermarktet und errang dort rasch einen bis heute anhaltenden Kultstatus. Dabei ist das Spiel eines der ersten Konsolenspiele, die eine voll umfängliche Sprachausgabe nutzten (die Pioniere auf diesem Gebiet waren Ys: Book 1 & 2). Im Laufe der darauffolgenden Jahre erschienen einige Neuauflagen von Lunar. So veröffentlichte Game Arts im Jahre 1996 ein Remake für den Sega Saturn, das den Namen "Silver Star Story" trug, wobei sich das Remake sowohl von der grafischen als auch von der storybedingten Seite im neuen Gewand zeigte. Als Beispiel sei der Tod von Dyne zu nennen, der im Original eine völlig andere Bewandnis hat und die Beziehung zwischen ihm und seinem Freund Ghaleon inklusive aller daran anhängigen Aspekte grundlegend verändert. Neben Grafik und Spielverlauf wurden auch einige Animesequenzen eingefügt, welche die Lebhaftigkeit und die Seele der Spielwelt unterstreichen sollten. Wenig später erschien auf derselben Konsole eine spezielle Version mit MPEG-Unterstützung, um diverse Qualitätseinbußen während der Sequenzen einzudämmen. Im Großen und Ganzen allerdings blieb das Spiel selbst dem vorangegangenen Remake gleich.

Bem-vindo ao mundo de Lunar, onde os dragões ainda vivem e a magia é valorizada acima de tudo. Junte-se a Alex, o jovem aventureiro, enquanto ele começa uma missão com seus amigos para salvar suas terras dos avanços esmagadores do Imperador Mágico. Explore calabouços, lute contra monstros aterrorizantes e colete informações dos locais enquanto avança em direção ao confronto explosivo com o próprio Imperador Mágico! Prepare-se para a aventura da sua vida!

locale.title: Mad Dog II: The Lost Gold
locale.synopsis: The sequel to American Laser Game's original Mad Dog McCree, with pretty much the same gameplay and motion capture graphics. This PC conversion seems to have been tweaked a bit to be more stable than the original Mad Dog. There's also somewhat limited replay value as you can choose from 3 different guides for 3 different routes through the game.

Mad Dog II : The Lost Gold sur Mega-CD est un jeu de tir à la première personne se déroulant au Far West. Entrez en plein coeur d'un film interactif et testez vos réflexes en tirant plus vite que votre ombre face aux gangsters, indiens, et autres ennemis. Enfin, retrouvez votre plus grand ennemi, Mad Dog pour un face-à-face qui promet d'être enflammé.

locale.title: Mad Dog McCree
locale.synopsis: Mag Dog McCree and his gang have kidnapped the Mayor and his daughter, and its up to you to rescue them. You must blast through bars and bank robberies to take the gang out and save everything you regard as good and true. Where the game differed from other Operation Wolf-influenced shoot 'em ups was in the use of live video, with real people appearing on the screen before you shoot them down. You have unlimited continues with which to reach the end, so the actors will have their screen deaths seen by as many people as they would had they starred in a film.

Mag Dog McCree y su pandilla han secuestrado al alcalde y a su hija, y depende de ti que los rescates. Debes atravesar bares y robos bancarios para sacar a la pandilla y salvar todo lo que consideres bueno y verdadero. El juego difería de otros shoot-emup con influencia de Operation Wolf en el uso de video en vivo, con personas reales apareciendo en la pantalla antes de derribarlas. Tienes límites ilimitados para llegar al final, por lo que a los actores se les verán las muertes en la pantalla tantas personas como lo hubieran hecho si hubieran protagonizado una película.

Mad Dog McCree sur Mega-CD est un jeu de tir se déroulant au Far-West. L'action consiste en un Western interactif dans lequel le joueur doit faire preuve de rapidité et ouvrir le feu plus vite que ses ennemis. Tout au long du jeu, soyez rapide, précis, et mettez fin au règne de terreur de l'infâme Mad Dog McCree.

Mag Dog McCree e sua gangue seqüestraram o prefeito e sua filha, e depende de você resgatá-los. Você deve atirar através de barras e roubos de banco para eliminar a gangue e salvar tudo o que você considera tão bom e verdadeiro. Onde o jogo diferiu de outros lançamentos de influências da Wolfgang da Operação Wolf foi no uso de vídeo ao vivo, com pessoas reais aparecendo na tela antes de derrubá-las.

locale.title: Mahou No Shoujo - Silky Lip
locale.synopsis: Mahou no Shoujo: Silky Lip is an Adventure game, developed and published by Riot, which was released in Japan in 1992.

Magical Girl : Silky Lip est un jeu de réflexion sur Mega-CD. Plein de jolies filles vous accompagnent dans vos recherches pour résoudre des énigmes. Ces dernières sont variées et de plus en plus difficiles.

locale.title: Make My Video: INXS
locale.synopsis: Make My Video: INXS is a video game based on real-time editing of music video footage. The setup is that a pair of female friends is hanging around a bar and monopolizing the pool table. The game explores the duo's interpersonal interactions with other patrons at the bar: There's the Fly, an aloof cool guy; Ted and Gomez, braindead surfer dudes trying to pick up the ladies, and who are thinly-veiled parodies of Bill & Ted; Poindexter, the nerd who is also trying to work up the courage to talk to the women; and Flo and Tiger, a pair of leather-clad tough chicks whose interest is beating the main subjects of the game so that they can control the bar music and play their Megadeth videotape. Each person or pair has own their ideas about what an ideal INXS video should or should not contain. The specifications normally come in the form of a set of pictures they either do or don't want to see, and perhaps some effects. The game features three INXS videos from which to choose: "Heaven Sent", "Not Enough Time", and "Baby Donât Cry".

La série des Make My Video fut l'une des rares séries de jeu à destination du Mega-CD à réellement tirer profit de ce nouveau support. Il ne s'agit d'ailleurs pas à proprement parler d'un jeu tel qu'on l'imagine, mais plutôt d'un programme original réellement inclassable. Les Make My Video font certes appel très légèrement à vos réflexes ou plutôt, à votre présence d'esprit, mais l'élément qui sera le plus mis à contribution est votre sens artistique. Ben oui, avec Make my video, vous voilà promu réalisateur de vidéo-clip !

locale.title: Make My Video: Kris Kross
locale.synopsis: Yo! Check it out. Now you've got the power to create your own music videos for mega rap act Kris Kross. In this revolutionary new music video experience for the Sega CD, a guest VJ gets in your face and tells you exactly the kinds of videos he's looking for. Then it's totally up to you to deliver. You control it all as you select, edit, slice and dice. You're working with hundreds of clips from real music videos, movies and never-before-seen video footage--all in synch with dizzying special effects and the freshest, hottest music ever. Wrap it up and get your grade straight from the veejay himself. If your video's good enough, you go to the next level. If not... well, let's just say our VJ doesn't take kindly to hacks. If you need to fine-tune your work, the edit mode enables you to edit your music videos to perfection -- just like the pros in the studios. And if you want to save your work, just use the video recorder interface with your VCR.

Yo! Maintenant, vous avez le pouvoir de créer vos propres vidéos musicales pour le groupe hip-hop Kri Kross. Dans cette nouvelle expérience révolutionnaire de musique vidéo pour Sega CD, VJ arrive devant vous et vous dit exactement les types de vidéos qu'il recherche. Ensuite, c'est à vous de décider si vous les livrées. Vous avez le plein contrôle tout en sélectionnant, éditant, coupant vos séquences. Vous travaillez avec des centaines d'extraits de vidéos réelles, de films et de séquences vidéo inédites - tout cela synchronisé avec des effets spéciaux vertigineux et la musique la plus fraîche et la plus chaude de tous les temps. Obtenez la reconnaissance directement de Veejay lui-même. Si votre vidéo est assez bonne, vous passez au niveau suivant. Sinon ... bien, disons simplement que notre VJ s'en fiche un peu de vos hacks. Si vous avez besoin d'affiner votre travail, le mode d'édition vous permet d'éditer vos vidéos musicales à la perfection - tout comme les pros dans les studios. Et si vous voulez enregistrer votre travail, utilisez simplement votre magnétoscope !

locale.title: Marko
locale.synopsis:
Marko's Magic Football, known simply as Marko in North America, is a 1994 platform game developed and published by Domark for the Sega Mega Drive, Sega Mega-CD and Sega Game Gear. The Mega-CD and Game Gear versions were released exclusively in Europe, though the Mega-CD port was unofficially brought to the US via Good Deal Games who started selling unlicensed reproductions sometime in the 2000s.
In Marko's Magic Football you play as Marko, a football player who uses his football to complete various platforming tasks.
The UK's Sonic the Comic featured several strips based on the character during its early years. A Sega Master System version was reportedly in development at some stage too, although was cancelled.

Marko's Magic Football, conocido simplemente como Marko en América del Norte, es un juego de plataforma de 1994 desarrollado y publicado por Domark para Sega Mega Drive, Sega Mega-CD y Sega Game Gear. Las versiones Mega-CD y Game Gear fueron lanzadas exclusivamente en Europa, aunque el puerto Mega-CD fue extraoficialmente traído a los EE. UU. A través de Good Deal Games, que comenzó a vender reproducciones sin licencia en algún momento de la década de 2000. En Marko's Magic Football, juegas como Marko, un jugador de fútbol que usa su fútbol para completar varias tareas de plataformas. Sonic the Comic del Reino Unido presentó varias tiras basadas en el personaje durante sus primeros años. Según los informes, una versión del Sistema Sega Master también estaba en desarrollo en algún momento, aunque fue cancelada.

Marko's Magic Football est un jeu de plates-formes sur Mega-CD. Vous contrôlez Marko, qui doit à tout prix arrêter le Colonel Brown qui transforme les gens en mutants. Armé de votre ballon magique, il faudra traverser tous les niveaux du jeu en faisant plusieurs tricks de football pour vous débarrasser de vos ennemis.

locale.title: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein
locale.synopsis:
Mary Shelley's Frankenstein is a video game that is based on the 1994 film of the same name. This version includes a bonus game: Bram Stoker's Dracula.
The player controls Frankenstein's monster as he stomps through the streets of Ingolstadt, Bavaria, in the year 1793 seeking revenge against a certain man named Victor for rejecting him once he was created. Since he is a product of artificial manufacturing, he is condemned and declared an expendable pariah by peasants and soldiers. The common folks that strive to kill Frankenstein's monster are highly ignorant about modern science and believe that he is truly a demon.
The player uses a wooden stick to ward off enemies. The stick that Frankenstein's monster carries can be put on fire if swung towards fire. Frankenstein also has an additional attack; a blue ball of negative energy that pops up when the player releases the button. Peasants in the game can either be male or female; soldiers are always male. The female peasants attack with pots while the male peasants attack with melee weapons. However, the soldiers (men dressed in red) attack the player with musket shots. Simple puzzles involving switches and pulleys must be solved in order to progress within the levels.

Mary Shelley's Frankenstein est un jeu vidéo qui est basé sur le film de 1994 du même nom. Cette version inclut un jeu bonus: Bram Stoker's Dracula.
Le joueur contrôle le monstre de Frankenstein alors qu'il ère dans les rues d'Ingolstadt, en Bavière, en 1793, cherchant à se venger d'un certain Victor pour l'avoir rejeter après l'avoir créé. Puisqu'il est un produit de fabrication artificielle, il est condamné et déclaré paria par les paysans et les soldats. Les gens ordinaires qui s'efforcent de tuer le monstre de Frankenstein sont très ignorants au sujet de la science moderne et croient qu'il est vraiment un démon.
Le joueur utilise un bâton en bois pour repousser les ennemis. Le bâton que le monstre de Frankenstein porte peut être enflammé si il est balancé en direction du feu. Frankenstein a également une attaque supplémentaire; Une boule bleue d'énergie négative qui apparaît lorsque le joueur relâche le bouton. Les paysans dans le jeu peuvent soit être des hommes ou de femmes; Les soldats sont toujours des hommes. Les paysannes attaquent avec des pots tandis que les paysans mâles attaquent avec des armes de mêlée. Cependant, les soldats (habillés en rouge) attaquent le joueur avec des tirs de mousquets. Des puzzles simples impliquant des interrupteurs et des poulies doivent être résolus afin de progresser dans les niveaux.

locale.title: Mega Schwarzschild
locale.synopsis: Mega Schwarzschild (メガシュヴァルツシルト) is a Sega Mega-CD simulation game released exclusively in Japan.

locale.title: Megarace
locale.synopsis: Virtual Television has given us a chance to do the things that we can't make real in everyday life: Race through 14 great tracks in 5 different environments in a totally virtual place where you can kill each other quite easily with sidekicks or guns. In every track you will see some symbols that can make your car speed up, slow up or even blow up, like your mega-host Lance Boyle says, "Who knows; who cares!" Everything you see in MegaRace is virtual and no one really dies there. So have fun!

MegaRace sur Mega-CD est un jeu de courses futuriste où tous les coups sont permis pour arriver en tête. Le joueur choisit son bolide favori puis se lance dans une course effrénée dans les quatorze circuits du jeu répartis dans cinq environnements différents. Plusieurs armes sont accessibles et il est possible de ramasser des bonus le long du chemin. Le plus rapide et le plus féroce l'emportera.

locale.title: MegaRace
locale.synopsis: Virtual Television has given us a chance to do the things that we can't make real in everyday life: Race through 14 great tracks in 5 different environments in a totally virtual place where you can kill each other quite easily with sidekicks or guns. In every track you will see some symbols that can make your car speed up, slow up or even blow up, like your mega-host Lance Boyle says, "Who knows; who cares!" Everything you see in MegaRace is virtual and no one really dies there. So have fun!

game.name: Mickey Mania - The Timeless Adventures Of Mickey Mouse

locale.title: Mickey Mania: The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse
locale.synopsis: Mickey Mania: The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse is a 2D-platformer developed by Traveller's Tales and published by Sony Imagesoft. In the game, you control Mickey Mouse, who must navigate through various side-scrolling levels, each designed and based from classical Mickey Mouse cartoons from 1928 to 1990.

Mickey Mania: The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse es un juego de plataformas en 2D desarrollado por Traveler's Tales y publicado por Sony Imagesoft. En el juego, controlas Mickey Mouse, que debe navegar a través de varios niveles de desplazamiento lateral, cada uno diseñado y basado en los dibujos animados clásicos de Mickey Mouse de 1928 a 1990.

locale.title: Mickey Mania
locale.synopsis: Mickey Mania (aussi appelé Mickey Mania : The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse) sur Mega-CD est un jeu de plates-formes. Le joueur incarne Mickey Mouse dans sept niveaux inspirés des dessins animés les plus célèbres de son histoire.

locale.title: Mickey Mania
locale.synopsis: Mickey Mania: The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse ist ein 2D-Jump 'n' Run. Du steuerst Mickey Maus durch unterschiedliche Side-Scrolling Level, die alle einen klassischen Mickey-Maus-Cartoon von 1928 bis 1990 repräsentieren und nach diesen gestaltet sind.

locale.title: Mickey Mania
locale.synopsis: "Mickey Mania" é um título que presta homenagem aos clássicos de animação do personagem, que estava previsto para ser lançado no ano em que completava 65 anos de criação, mas chegando ao mercado um ano depois. Segue o estilo plataforma, com fases bem elaboradas e criativas, que se destacam pelas belas animações e visuais detalhados. A aventura conta com ambientes inspirados nos desenhos "Steamboat Willie", de 1928 (o começo da fase é em preto e branco, assim como o desenho original), passando por "The Mad Doctor", de 1933, "The Band Concert" de 1935, "Moose Hunters" de 1937, "Lonesome Ghosts" de 1937, "Mickey and the Beanstalk" de 1947 e "The Prince and the Pauper", de 1990.

locale.title: Microcosm
locale.synopsis:
In the year 2051, two mega corporations battle it out for supremacy over an overcrowded, overpolluted planet. CyberTech Industries, the dominant company on the planet, is being challenged by Axiom, who blames the former for their president's death. To gain revenge, they secretly inject CyberTech's president, Anton Korsby, with a virus that threatens to take over his body, and ultimately destroy himself and CyberTech. Your mission is to enter Korsby's body, destroy the virus, and defeat the organism that controls his brain.
Microcosm is a 3D action shooter, similar to Descent, that takes place entirely within the human body. The concept was inspired by the 1966 movie Fantastic Voyage. The player pilots his way through various parts of the anatomy, blasting virii and enemy ships, while gaining power-ups and faster, stronger craft. The goal of the game is to eventually reach the brain to stop Grey M, the entity that controls Korsby's body.
Microcosm makes heavy use of full-motion video and features high-resolution fractal graphics (to simulate the walls of veins and arteries), digital music and sound effects.

Microcosm sur Mega-CD est un jeu d'action à la première personne qui se déroule dans un univers futuriste. En l'an 2051, deux compagnies se livrent une guerre sans merci pour le pouvoir suprême. Lorsque le président de l'une d'elle, Anton Korsby, se fait injecter un virus, le dernier recours est d'aller dans son corps pour détruire l'infection de l'intérieur. Le joueur devra retrouver son chemin tout en débarrassant les lieux des organismes malveillants et du virus qui domine le cerveau de Korsb

locale.title: Midnight Raiders
locale.synopsis:
A FMV rail shooter placing you in the helmet of rookie chopper gunner "Joker." Terrorists have kidnapped a German biochemist and taken him to a Middle Eastern oil refinery, where he is forced to work on a lethal toxin. Joker and crew must fly to the refinery, shooting down enemy tanks and helicopters, then Joker must rappel down to the refinery and rescue the chemist on foot.
The helicopter sections follow a pattern similar to Tomcat Alley, showing brief clips of the cast in the cockpit, followed by a "nose camera" shot of an enemy approaching. During this shot, you have the ability to move a set of crosshairs over the enemy and press the "fire" button. If you're on target, you are rewarded with military archival footage of helicopters shooting rockets, and close up footage of models exploding.
The on-foot sections follow an identical pattern, though with hand-held cameras placing you in the "eyes" of Joker, and black-clad guards taking the place of helicopters. Otherwise, the idea of having a few seconds to react and aim crosshairs is the same. The plot is expanded through occasional cutscenes in both the helicopter and foot sections.

Le jeu est principalement fait de FMV et de quick-time events. Vous incarnez Joker. Vous et votre équipe, Stryker, Sparks et Linus, obtenez l' ordre d'exécuter une mission top secrète. Malheureusement pour vous, la CIA ne veut pas de survivants. En volant des hélicoptères Apache AH-64, votre équipe débarque dans l'installation d'Al-Shakkur. Alors à pied, vous seul devez trouver et sauver un scientifique enlevé détenu quelque part à l'intérieure du complexe. Le professeur Victor Mensch détient (dans sa mémoire) la formule pour un nouveau gaz mortel. Tout repose entre vos mains. Mais attention! Les choses ne sont pas ce qu'elles semblent être...

game.name: Might And Magic 3 - Isles Of Terra

locale.title: Might and Magic III: Isles of Terra
locale.synopsis:
The third installment of the roleplaying series, with a multi-faceted plot full of twists and turns. Ease of use was central to the gameplay and interface, and the plot included piles of new twists and turns.
Lead a party of adventurers to rendezvous with the legendary wizard Corak. From dark moldy dungeons, through corridors of hewn stone and timber, and onward to the lofty frozen peaks of Terra you will uncover the mysteries that surround the exotic islands in the Great Sea.

Might and Magic III : Isles of Terra est la suite de Might and Magic sur Mega-CD. Après avoir vaincu Sheltem dans le deuxième épisode, le groupe de six aventuriers constitué d'humains, nains, bêtes et elfes, devra aider Corak à exterminer Sheltem une fois pour toutes dans son propre monde appelé Terra. Le joueur dirige les six personnages en même temps et progresse dans les donjons remplis d'énigmes et d'informations à recueillir.

locale.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
locale.synopsis: This take on the Power Rangers franchise is different from the many other Power Ranger games as it features FMV with real video of the actual TV show. The footage is spliced from nine different episodes and the gameplay is reminiscent of games such as Dragon's Lair and Space Ace where the player must press a button at a certain time to avoid being punched, kicked, avoid a trap, etc. Failure to miss pressing a button will continue to play the footage, but cause the player to loose a life. After a certain set of lives are lost, the game will be over.

Mighty Morphin Power Rangers sur Mega CD est un jeu de combat tiré de la série télévisée éponyme. Le joueur incarne l'un des combattants à culotte bariolée lors de combats contre les monstres de Rita. Au terme de l'affrontement, le monstre grandit. Une seconde phase débute alors où le joueur incarne Megazord.

locale.title: Mortal Kombat
locale.synopsis:
Five Hundred years ago, an ancient and well respected Shaolin fighting tournament, held every 50 years, was corrupted by an evil and elderly sorcerer by the name of Shang Tsung. Shang was accompanied by Prince Goro, a warrior of the Shokan race (a four armed half-human/half-dragon). Knowing that if ten tournaments in a row were won by the Outworld champion, the Earth Realm would be conquered by evil and fall into darkness, Shang entered Goro in the tournament and had him defeat the great Kung Lao. Goro has been reigning supreme as the undefeated fighting champion for five hundred years now. As the last tournament required draws near, Raiden, Thunder God and protector of the Earth Realm, enacts a plan to tip the scales in the humans favor, Seven fighters step into the arena on Shang Tsung's mysterious island: Shaolin warrior Liu Kang, Special Forces operative Sonya Blade, the mercenary thug Kano, fame-seeking actor Johnny Cage, the ice wielding Lin Kuei warrior Sub-Zero and his undead adversary Scorpion, and Raiden himself.
Mortal Kombat is a side-scrolling 1 on 1 fighting game. Fighting is set as one on one kombat, allowing each player to perform a variety of punches, kicks, and special moves in order to defeat their opponent. When the opponent faces their second round loss, the winner can perform a finishing move called a "Fatality" on the loser. The Fatality is a move unique to each fighter that graphically kills the loser in a blood-soaked finale.
Mortal Kombat began its life as a 2-player arcade title. It is notable for its use of digitized actors to represent the game's fighters, as well as its use of copious amounts of blood during gameplay.

Battez vos adversaires pour défier le guerrier Shokan nommé Goro, champion du tournoi depuis plus de 500 ans. Adaptation du célébrissime jeu d'arcade, Mortal Kombat sur Mega-CD vous permet d'incarner 8 prétendants à la victoire finale, dont les protégés du seigneur Raiden, seuls remparts contre la menace qui pèse sur le Royaume de la Terre.

game.name: My Paint - The Animated Paint Program

locale.title: My Paint: The Animated Paint Program
locale.synopsis: My Paint, the world's first animated paint program gives you the power to push your creativity to new heights! It's a full featured paint program you not only see, but hear! Freehand draw your own masterpiece or choose from any of the over 200 built-in drawings. Everything from Planes, Trains and Automobiles to Velociraptors, Bats and Panthers are included. Use any of the many patterns like dinosaur skins, moving water, stripes, dots, or the cool animated stickers to bring your drawings to life!

My Paint : The Animated Paint Program sur Mega CD est un jeu de dessin et de coloriage. Deux modes sont proposés au joueur qui peut s'exprimer librement avec les options standards de la palette graphique (crayon, cercles, carrés, traits, spray...) ou se contenter de faire du remplissage en partant de dessins sans couleur. Le joueur peut également donner vie à ses chefs-d'oeuvre en les agrémentant d'icônes animées.

locale.title: NBA Jam
locale.synopsis: NBA Jam is a two-on-two basketball game You can play any NBA team, and you can play as players like Barkley, Starks, Pippen, and Grant. Each human player controls a single player, so choose your squad wisely to take team-mate skill into account. The game is action-oriented, and players can perform unrealistic slam-dunks. Full performance statistics are automatically recorded. The play clock and 3-point line apply, but other rules are largely overlooked.

NBA Jam sur Mega-CD est le premier jeu de basket à proposer de jouer avec des joueurs professionnels mais avec les règles de la rue. Les matches se disputent donc en deux contre deux et les fautes sont presque absentes. En revanche, les actions sont volontairement irréalistes, afin de pouvoir admirer ses stars de NBA préférées réaliser des dunks de plusieurs mètres de hauteur, tout en faisant des figures spectaculaires.

locale.title: NFL Football Trivia Challenge
locale.synopsis: NFL Football Trivia Challenge is a trivia game with an National Football League license. Either player can pick his favourite team to play with. TV commentators Pat Summerall and Tom Bookshier describe various situations in play accompanied by 1200 images and 300 Full Motion Video clips. 1500 multiple choice questions are waiting to be answered in the game. For each correct answer the player gains yardage in the game and increases his chances of scoring a point. The player with most points after 60 questions wins the game. There are three different difficulty levels to play at.

game.name: Nfl's Greatest - San Francisco Vs. Dallas 1978-1993

locale.title: Nfl's Greatest - San Francisco Vs. Dallas 1978-1993
locale.synopsis: Top stars for the Cowboys and 49ers from the 70's, 80's, and 90's in one game. Staubach, Dorsett, "Too Tall" Jones, Aikman, Irvin, Smith - take the field against Montana, Lott, Clark, Rice, Watters, Young - just to name a few! You choose the quarterback, you call the plays - then watch the action unfold in full color TruVideo! Imagine Tony Dorsett and Troy Aikman in the same backfield, or Steve Young hitting Dwight Clark witha TD pass, or "Too Tall" Jones chasing down Young - it can happen! 15 years of real football footage from the NFL Films Library and the latest Sega CD sound and technology make your dream game come to life.

Les plus grandes stars des "Cowboys" et des "49ers" des années 70, 80 et 90 en un seul jeu. Staubach, Dorsett, «Too Tall» Jones, Aikman, Irvin, Smith - incarnez ces joueurs et foulez le terrain contre Montana, Lott, Clark, Rice, Watters, Young - pour n'en nommer que quelques-uns! Vous choisissez le quarterback, "call the plays" - puis regardez l'action se dérouler en couleur TruVideo! Imaginez Tony Dorsett et Troy Aikman en milieu offensif, ou Steve Young frappant Dwight Clark avec un touchdown, ou "Too Tall" Jones poursuivant Young - c'est possible! 15 ans d'images réelles de football de la "NFL Films Library" avec le son et la technologie dernier cri de la Sega CD.

locale.title: NHL '94
locale.synopsis:
After establishing themselves in the virtual rinks, EA combined both NHL and NHLPA licenses in NHL '94, allowing them to feature all 26 real teams (including both expansion teams) and players of the new NHL season for the first time in the series.
Aside from the licenses, the gameplay for this edition sees for the first time the inclusion of the devastating one-timer shot, but to keep forwards (literally) in check, defenders also feature harder body checks, with new animations. For an additional challenge, players can also choose to control the goalkeeper manually. A popular feature in previous editions, fighting is completely removed from the game. Game modes include exhibition games (or "regular season" in-game), playoffs (best of one or best of seven) and an all new shoot-out mode. The main options remain basically the same couple since the establishment of the series - period length (5, 10 or 20 minutes), line changes (off, manual or the new automatic mode) and penalties. (off, on, on but no offsides).

Después de establecerse en las pistas virtuales, EA combinó las licencias NHL y NHLPA en la NHL '94, lo que les permitió presentar los 26 equipos reales (incluidos ambos equipos de expansión) y los jugadores de la nueva temporada de la NHL por primera vez en la serie. Además de las licencias, la jugabilidad de esta edición ve por primera vez la inclusión del devastador golpe de un solo disparo, pero para mantener a los forwards (literalmente) bajo control, los defensores también cuentan con controles corporales más duros, con nuevas animaciones. Para un desafío adicional, los jugadores también pueden elegir controlar al portero manualmente. Una característica popular en las ediciones anteriores, la lucha se elimina por completo del juego. Los modos de juego incluyen juegos de exhibición (o "temporada regular" en el juego), playoffs (el mejor de uno o el mejor de siete) y un nuevo modo de shoot-out. Las principales opciones permanecen básicamente en la misma pareja desde el establecimiento de la serie: duración del período (5, 10 o 20 minutos), cambios de línea (apagado, manual o el nuevo modo automático) y penalizaciones. (off, on, on pero no offsides).

NHL '94 est un jeu de hockey sur glace sur Mega-CD. Choisissez votre équipe favorite grâce à la licence officielle de la National Hockey League (saison 1993-1994) et faites-la entrer dans l'histoire. Trois modes de jeu sont disponibles : "Regular Season", "Playoffs" et "Shootout" qui permet de s'entraîner aux tirs aux buts. De nouvelles animations ont été ajoutées et il est désormais possible de contrôler le gardien pendant le match.

Depois de se estabelecer nas pistas virtuais, a EA combinou as licenças NHL e NHLPA na NHL '94, permitindo que elas apresentassem as 26 equipes reais (incluindo ambas as equipes de expansão) e os jogadores da nova temporada da NHL pela primeira vez na série. Além das licenças, a jogabilidade para esta edição vê pela primeira vez a inclusão do devastador tiro com um cronômetro, mas para continuar (literalmente) em xeque, os defensores também apresentam verificações corporais mais difíceis, com novas animações. Para um desafio adicional, os jogadores também podem escolher controlar o goleiro manualmente. Uma característica popular nas edições anteriores, a luta é completamente removida do jogo. Os modos de jogo incluem jogos de exibição (ou "temporada regular" no jogo), playoffs (melhor de um ou melhor de sete) e um novo modo de disputa.

locale.title: Night Striker
locale.synopsis:
Night Striker is a third-person shooter reminiscent of Space Harrier, converted from the 1989 Taito coin-op. Laser opticts expert Dr. Lindvery Maska and his daughter have been kidnapped by a terrorist group, and Dick Dagras, head of the Special Service Agency, is mobilizing a group of elite soldiers experienced in the use of special armored flying cars, in order to rescue Dr. Maska and destoy this terrorist group.
The player flies through each stage, controlling their armored car and shooting down waves of enemies. A boss appears at the end of each stage, and after this the player must choose what path to take in the next stage, as in Darius. Instead of lives, the player has a shield that takes damage from each hit, but is recharged at the end of each stage.
The Sega CD version of the game features remixed CD-audio, and the Saturn version features a set of exclusive bonus levels.

Voici l'adaptation de Night Striker, sorti d'abord en 1989 sur borne d'arcade et qui fit le bonheur des amateurs de tube shooter futuristes. Aux commandes de votre hovercraft, préparez-vous à affronter moult ennemis terrestres ou aériens avec bien sur les classiques boss en fin de niveaux. A l'instar d'un Darius vous pourrez aussi choisir votre chemin (deux possibilités) symbolisé par des lettres.

locale.title: Night Trap
locale.synopsis:
Five girls go to a party to a nice house on a lakeside. Five girls disappear without a trace... Now another five girls go there, in order to spend the vacation with the Martins, the owners of the house, in particular with the lovely Ms. Martin. This time, you should not let them die a gruesome death! Because "nice people" can sometimes turn out to be... yes, that's right - vampires. The whole house is full of traps, that are intended to catch the poor innocent girls, so that the vampires can suck their blood... ugh. Luckily, the brave adventurer is there in order to cease to be hunted and to become a hunter instead! Set the traps so that they will capture the villains themselves, using precise timing and good organization.
Night Trap was the very first game that used the FMV (full-motion video) technology with live actors. Although it didn't contain nudity or particularly gory scenes, it was considered one of the first games to have a mature content.

Night Trap sur Mega-CD est un jeu d'aventure qui se déroule comme un film interactif. Le joueur incarne un agent du S.C.A.T. et doit protéger 5 jeunes filles d'une horde de vampires à l'intérieur d'une maison. Il faut tendre un maximum de pièges et surveiller en permanence l'action à l'aide des caméras de surveillance pour arrêter les buveurs de sang. De vrais acteurs sont présents pour les scènes cinématiques du jeu.

Cinco garotas vão a uma festa em uma bela casa à beira do lago. Cinco meninas desaparecem sem deixar vestígios ... Agora, mais cinco meninas vão lá, para passar as férias com os Martins, os donos da casa, em particular com a adorável Srta. Martin. Desta vez, você não deve deixá-los ter uma morte horrível! Porque "pessoas legais" às vezes podem ser ... sim, isso mesmo - vampiros. A casa inteira está cheia de armadilhas, que se destinam a pegar as pobres meninas inocentes, para que os vampiros possam sugar seu sangue ... ugh. Felizmente, o bravo aventureiro está lá para deixar de ser caçado e se tornar um caçador! Defina as armadilhas para que elas capturem os vilões, usando um timing preciso e uma boa organização.
Night Trap foi o primeiro jogo que usou a tecnologia FMV (full-motion video) com atores ao vivo. Embora não contenha nudez ou cenas particularmente sangrentas, foi considerado um dos primeiros jogos a ter um conteúdo maduro.
A versão para Sega CD 32X traz melhorias na interface do game e gráficos (FMV) com imagens maiores e resolução aprimorada.

locale.title: Ninja Warriors, The
locale.synopsis:
Two player side scrolling beat-em-up converted from the Taito coin-op that featured three monitor screens side by side. The Amiga version was developed in letterbox format in order to show as much of the wide screen background graphics as possible.
The player(s) controlled robot Ninjas, which battled their way through the levels using Shuriken and knives. As the Ninja's took damage their classic Ninja garb was torn away to reveal robotic limbs, torso or head. When the damage reached critical the Ninja Robot would explode, scattering mechanical body parts.
As with The Sales Curve's later title SWIV, The Ninja Warriors used the company's Dynamic Loading System to load sprites, sound and background graphics from disk on the fly.

Le tyran Benglar se sert de son pouvoir pour laver le cerveau de tous ses prisonniers, et il semble désormais invincible. Cependant, la Résistance a trouvé une nouvelle arme, des machines capables de penser et de combattre : les Ninjas Warriors. Dans le beat'em all The Ninja Warriors sur Mega-CD, le joueur peut choisir parmi 3 héros : Ninja, Kunoichi ou Kamaitachi. Chacun se joue différemment et possède une super-attaque personnelle.

locale.title: Nostalgia 1907
locale.synopsis: Nostalgia 1907 (1907) is a Sega Mega-CD adventure game released exclusively in Japan.
Nostalgia 1907 (1907) es un juego de aventura Sega Mega-CD lanzado exclusivamente en Japón.

Nostalgia 1907 est un jeu d'aventure sorti sur Mega-CD et qui nous renvoie à l'époque des années 10, en 1907 très exactement, époque connue sous le nom de l'Age des Hommes. Le joueur doit explorer l'environnement de cette époque, tout en se plongeant dans l'histoire afin de résoudre l'intrigue proposée. Pas facile sachant que le jeu est uniquement disponible en japonais !

locale.title: Novastorm
locale.synopsis:
A behind-the-view perspective of a shooter's dream: Blast enemies against a cinematic backdrop. Kill the computer-controlled fighters before they take over the world!
Unlike first-generation interactive movies with action, Novastorm has hooks into the environment; if you move into the path of a pre-rendered obstacle and it "hits" you, you take damage, etc.

Novastorm sur Mega-CD est un shoot'em up spatial dans lequel le joueur pilote son vaisseau alors que la caméra est en vue de dos. Le but est de détruire tous les ennemis qui se présentent tout en évitant les différents obstacles de l'environnement.

locale.title: Panic!
locale.synopsis: A virus has infected the world's computer network, which effects all electronical devices on the earth. However, a special program called "Panic!" is designed to counter the effects of the virus and restore the network back to working order. You play Slap the Boy and his sidekick, Stick the Dog(they're not actions, it's their names) who set out to restore the network back to working order.

Panic ! (intitulé Switch ! au Japon) sur Mega CD est un jeu de réflexion à l'univers décalé. Un Virus informatique a corrompu l'intégralité du réseau mondial mais un programme appelé Panic a été créé pour contrer le virus. Le joueur incarne Slap, un garçon en charge de prendre les commandes du programme Panic et de remettre le réseau en ordre.

locale.title: Penn & Teller : Smoke and Mirrors
locale.synopsis:
Penn & Teller's Smoke and Mirrors is an unreleased video game endorsed by magicians Penn Jillette and Teller. It was planned to be released for the Sega Mega-CD in April 1995, with PC and 3DO versions coming out later in the year, but was cancelled as the publisher, Absolute Entertainment went bankrupt.
Frank Cifaldi, editor of Lost Levels brought the game to the public after being handed a copy by a magazine reviewer. It is a compilation of minigames and a platform game starring the two magicians, made to fool your friends.
The game has become famous due to the inclusion of the "Desert Bus" minigame. In Desert Bus, the player drives a bus across the United States, from Tucson, Arizona to Las Vegas, Nevada at a real-time maximum speed of 45 miles per hour. This means the journey is eight hours long, and as the game cannot be paused, play is continuous. There is no scenery to speak of and no traffic, and the bus always veers slightly to the right, meaning the player cannot let go of the controller within that time. The journey is also a perfectly straight line, and once you've arrived at Las Vegas, you will score one point and be offered the chance to take the trip back.
The score counter goes up to a maximum of 99, meaning gameplay is 41 days long. This minigame is used annually for the "Desert Bus For Hope" charity event, who have raised $233,678.47 in the last three years by getting people to play Desert Bus for as long as possible. Supposedly the realistic journey time was built in direct response to the video game controversy surrounding many violent games of the time.

Penn & Teller's Smoke and Mirrors é um videogame inédito endossado pelos mágicos Penn Jillette e Teller. Ele foi planejado para ser lançado para o Mega-CD da Sega em abril de 1995, com versões de PC e 3DO sendo lançadas no final do ano, mas foi cancelada quando a editora, a Absolute Entertainment, foi à falência.
Frank Cifaldi, editor do Lost Levels, trouxe o jogo ao público depois de receber uma cópia de um revisor de revista. É uma compilação de minigames e um jogo de plataformas estrelando os dois mágicos, feitos para enganar seus amigos.
O jogo ficou famoso devido à inclusão do minijogo "Desert Bus". Em Desert Bus, o jogador dirige um ônibus pelos Estados Unidos, de Tucson, Arizona até Las Vegas, Nevada, a uma velocidade máxima em tempo real de 45 quilômetros por hora. Isso significa que a jornada tem oito horas de duração e, como o jogo não pode ser pausado, o jogo é contínuo. Não há nenhum cenário para falar e nenhum tráfego, e o ônibus sempre se move ligeiramente para a direita, o que significa que o jogador não pode deixar o controle dentro desse tempo. A viagem também é uma linha perfeitamente reta, e uma vez que você chegou a Las Vegas, você marcará um ponto e terá a chance de fazer a viagem de volta.
O contador de pontos aumenta para um máximo de 99, o que significa que a jogabilidade é de 41 dias. Este minigame é usado anualmente para o evento de caridade "Desert Bus For Hope", que arrecadou US $ 233.678,47 nos últimos três anos, levando as pessoas a jogar no Desert Bus o maior tempo possível. Supostamente, o tempo de viagem realista foi construído em resposta direta à controvérsia do videogame em torno de muitos jogos violentos da época.

locale.title: Pitfall: The Mayan Adventure
locale.synopsis: Pitfall: The Mayan Adventure is a side-scrolling action game in which you play adventurer Pitfall Harry Jr in search of his father Pitfall Harry. You battle your way through the Mayan jungles, waterfalls, deserted mines and can bungee jump and boomerang your way to safety. There are 13 levels and the action is fast and gripping. You will need to be attentiveand quick. Or prepare to die.

Pitfall: The Mayan Adventure es un juego de acción de desplazamiento lateral en el que juegas al aventurero Pitfall Harry Jr en busca de su padre Pitfall Harry. Te abres camino a través de las junglas mayas, cascadas, minas desiertas y puedes saltar en bungee y bumerías para llegar a un lugar seguro. Hay 13 niveles y la acción es rápida y apasionante. Tendrás que estar atento y rápido. O prepárate para morir.

Pitfall sur Mega CD est un jeu de plates-formes. Le joueur incarne Pitfall Harry, un explorateur qui doit évoluer dans la jungle en évitant toutes sortes d'obstacles tels que sables mouvants, serpents, tapirs, singes, jaguars, etc. Il peut éviter les trous, sauter par dessus les obstacles, rebondir sur les toiles d'araignées, se balancer de liane en liane et attraper d'autres lianes élastiques qui lui permettent de monter verticalement.

Mantendo o estilo do clássico original, "The Mayan Adventure" é um jogo de plataforma 2D recheado de caminhos, passagens secretas e muitos perigos e obstáculos, que vão exigir um raciocínio rápido e muita habilidade por parte dos jogadores. A história se passa vários anos após as aventuras originais no Atari e desta vez protagonizada pelo filho do audacioso aventureiro, Pitfall Harry Jr. Juntos, os dois resolvem explorar a América Central em busca dos tesouros perdidos dos Maia. Mas algo terrível acontece: Pitfall Harry é capturado pelo espírito de um guerreiro Maia diabólico chamado de Zakelua: o Senhor do Mal. Agora armado apenas com um estilingue, o jovem Harry Jr. deve se aventurar no desconhecido mundo para resgatar o seu pai. Felizmente durante o percurso é possível encontrar antigas armas Maia que ajudarão nosso herói a combater inimigos e obstáculos como bumerangues e pedras explosivas.

locale.title: Popful Mail
locale.synopsis:
In this platform action game, you play as a cute bounty hunter known as Popful Mail. While you might think that a cute Anime chick would have no trouble making a living slashing bad guys with her sword, Popful is having a hard time making ends meet. One day, however, Popful learns about a magician who has gone rogue and has a hefty bounty on his head. So, her adventure begins as Popful fights her way through a new adventure, and makes new friends along the way.
Primarily this is an action game with very slight RPG elements. As you make your way through the plethora of levels, you will have to collect money from slain foes. You use this money in the shops to buy weapons, armor, health, and so on. Also, this game features interaction with many, many characters through both on-screen dialog and fully animated sequences. Some of these characters become playable as you progress through the game.
This release has the same story and general gameplay style as the earlier version, but otherwise was made from scratch, having entirely different graphics, locations, enemies, challenges, etc.

La linda cazadora de recompensas conocida como Popful Mail parece que no tendría problemas para ganarse la vida acabando con los malos con su espada. En realidad Mail está pasando por tiempos difíciles. Un día, sin embargo, ella se entera de que una bruja ha sido corrompida y tiene una fuerte recompensa por su cabeza. Tu aventura comienza a medida que Popful se abre camino a través de una nueva aventura, y hace nuevos amigos en el camino.
¨Popful Mail¨ es un juego de acción de plataformas con elementos de RPG muy ligeros. A medida que la heroína se abre camino a través de las etapas recoge el dinero de los enemigos muertos. Este dinero puede ser utilizado en tiendas para comprar armas, armaduras, salud, y así sucesivamente. El juego cuenta con la interacción con muchos personajes a través tanto de diálogo en pantalla y secuencias completamente animadas. Algunos de estos personajes se convierten en jugables a medida que el jugador progresa a través del juego.
Esta versión tiene la misma historia y estilo de juego general de la versión anterior, pero por lo demás estaba hecho de cero, teniendo gráficos, localizaciones, enemigos, retos, etc... completamente diferentes.

Popful Mail est un jeu d'action sur Mega-CD. Situé dans un monde fantastique, vous incarnez Popful Mail. Vous attrapez un criminel mais pas de chance celui-ci s'enfuit et vous ne pouvez réclamer aucune prime. Frustré, une fois de plus, vous prenez la route du prochain village, où vous vous rendez compte avec stupeur que votre propre tête est mise à prix. Afin d'échapper aux chasseurs de têtes, vous vous lancez dans une grande aventure.

Tudo começa em um mundo de Fantasia Medieval, Mail uma Elfa de longos cabelos vermelhos é uma caçadora de recompensas e está atrás de um perigoso vilão chamado Nuts Cracker, Mail está procurando Nuts em uma floresta até que o encontra, Mail ataca Nuts mas ele escapa deixando apenas sua "cabeça" evitando que Mail o prenda e receba a recompensa pela sua prisão, muito frustrada Mail chega em uma pequena cidade onde tenta a todo custo vender a "cabeça" de Nuts Cracker mas ninguém se interessa a dar recompensa alguma a ela, chegando em uma Loja de Equipamentos Mail encontra um Cartaz de Procura-se com o valor de 2,000,000 gold de um Mago Criminoso chamado Muttonhead, admirada com tamanho valor da Recompensa Mail decide partir em uma aventura para achar e prender Muttonhead, o Mago Criminoso e poder receber a grandiosa recompensa. Assim começa Popful Mail!

game.name: Power Factory Featuring C+c Music Factory

locale.title: Power Factory Featuring C+C Music Factory
locale.synopsis:
The first of Digital Pictures' "Make My Video" line has you "editing" three of C + C Music Factory's most famous songs - "Gonna Make You Sweat," "Things That Make You Go Hmm..." and "Here We Go Let's Rock & Roll."
The plot puts you inside the music factory of the game's name, where two linemen sweat and toil under the oppressive thumb of a wheelchair-bound corporate executive. Video discs literally roll down an assembly line while C + C record their sounds behind three closed doors. You are asked to help out in editing these videos, appease the corporate masters, and lift the burden from everyone.
The game is played from a panel meant to resemble and act as a non-linear editor. Editing is entirely linear however, as three distinct video "feeds" run simultaneously along the bottom of the screen. Each is mapped to the A, B, or C button, and pressing one sends that video to master viewer, where it is recorded. The D-pad toggles various effects on and off from a bin in the upper left. One feed will always be of C + C's actual video, with the other two holding appropriate stock footage (like a doorbell timed to appear with the lyrics "Ding dong, who is it?")
The video can not be stopped or rewound once the editing process begins, so the player must quickly route video to the viewer and apply effects within a given amount of time. This allows for editing challenges, where the player must fill specific requests, like having fast cuts or showing no dancers.
After a video is edited, the player gets to watch their cut in its entirety. They are then graded by the FMV characters and move to the next song, or try a new edit of the previous one.

Dans Power Factory featuring C+C Music Factory, votre mission est de monter en temps réel trois clips pour le groupe C + C. Pour cela, vous verrez trois pistes vidéo défiler et vous devrez à la volée sélectionner la piste appropriée suivant la demande de votre patron. Il vous sera aussi possible d'ajouter des effets sur les images pour tenter de plaire à Clivillès et Cole.

locale.title: Power Monger
locale.synopsis:
Powermonger takes the basic design and concepts of Bullfrog's previous game Populous, and places it in a war context. The game cast the player as a dispossessed warlord plundering his way through 195 territories on the way to world conquest. Several other leaders have the same goal.
The gameworld is now made up of polygons, so the view can be rotated and moved with greater freedom than Populous. Trade, diplomacy, inventions, and scorched earth invasions all play a key role in how the player progressed through the game. Two-player games via modem links are available on computer versions.

PowerMonger est un jeu de stratégie sur Mega CD. Vous incarnez un seigneur qui a été dépossédé et devez tout faire pour reconquérir vos territoires d'antan. Il faudra guider votre peuple au mieux et vous développer dans différents domaines : économie, invention ou encore diplomatie. D'autres seigneurs sont présents sur la carte. A vous de les détruire ou de les prendre comme alliés.

locale.title: Prince of Persia
locale.synopsis:
The Grand Vizier Jaffar has thrown you into a dark dungeon and plans to marry the girl of your dreams in an hour. You're not going to let that happen are you? Try to escape from the dungeon, take out Jaffar's guards, find your way through the Sultan's palace and defeat Jaffar himself. Now go, you've got 60 minutes!
Prince of Persia is a 2D platformer with run and jump gameplay. Your hero must avoid deadly traps, solve some simple puzzles and engage in sword fights with the guards. The player has an infinite amount of lives, but has to restart at the beginning of a level each time he dies, and must complete the game within an hour. An especially noteworthy aspect of the game is the very fluent animation of your character.
The Game Boy Color and SNES versions of the game feature additional levels and new enemies. The Genesis version has a new intro and an altered set of graphics but the level layout remains almost identical to that of the original.

Prince of Persia sur Mega CD est un jeu de plates-formes se déroulant dans le Moyen-Orient. Le joueur contrôle le Prince de Perse qui peut marcher, courir, se baisser, sauter, s'accrocher, et combattre à l'épée. Le but est de terminer tous les niveaux pour libérer la princesse dans le temps imparti, c'est-à-dire une heure. Chaque niveau consiste en un donjon de plus en plus grand et parsemé d'embûches (précipices, dalles se dérobant sous les pieds, pics sortant du sol).

locale.title: Prize Fighter
locale.synopsis:
Prize Fighter is a FMV boxing game which puts the player in the body of "The Kid" against four opponents: Honeyboy Fernandez, Mega Joe Falco, Rex Hawkins, and the ultimate challenge, Nuke "The Duke" Johnson, divided over two CDs.
While the game requires a completely different approach than sprite or polygonal games, the tactics are still the same - jab, punch and deliver uppercuts when the opponent has his defenses down, and block and bob as he makes his moves. After a win the player can improve his left and right glove abilities and stamina by assigning "Power Points" to each area.
The only sprites visible during the bouts are the player gloves and the health indicators - the boxers and the rest of the ring are black and white FMV. Like with other FMV games, the player can enable tips, which indicates to hit certain butttons when required.

Prize Fighter es un juego de boxeo FMV que pone al jugador en el cuerpo de "The Kid" contra cuatro oponentes: Honeyboy Fernández, Mega Joe Falco, Rex Hawkins y el último desafío, Nuke "The Duke" Johnson, dividido en dos CD.
Si bien el juego requiere un enfoque completamente diferente de los juegos de sprites o poligonales, las tácticas siguen siendo las mismas: golpear, golpear y lanzar uppercuts cuando el oponente tiene sus defensas hacia abajo, y bloquear y sacudir mientras hace sus movimientos. Después de una victoria, el jugador puede mejorar sus habilidades de guante izquierdo y derecho y la resistencia asignando "Puntos de poder" a cada área.
Los únicos sprites visibles durante los combates son los guantes de jugador y los indicadores de salud: los boxeadores y el resto del ring son FMV en blanco y negro. Al igual que con otros juegos de FMV, el jugador puede habilitar sugerencias, lo que indica que debe golpear ciertos botones cuando sea necesario.

Prize Fighter est un jeu de boxe sur Mega-CD. Entraînez-vous, suivez une évolution progressive de votre personnage et devenez le meilleur boxeur de tous les temps. Le titre vous propose différents modes de jeu pour vous aguerrir et gagner de l'expérience pour vos combats. Faites les bons choix et les sacrifices nécessaires pour accéder à l'élite mondiale.

locale.title: Pro Yakyuu Super League Cd
locale.synopsis:
Pro Yakyuu Super League CD is a baseball game released as part of the Super League series for the Sega Mega-CD exclusively in Japan.
Is the third title in Sega's 16-bit baseball franchise, and the first for the Mega CD. It is again a standard catcher-view baseball sim featuring an NPB license with full 1992 Central and Pacific League team rosters, along with two all-star teams. The game features Pennant Race and Exhibition modes, six different stadiums, and the option to play either a day or night match.

Pro Yakyuu Super League CD est un jeu de base-ball pour Mega-CD. Le titre vous permet de revivre toute la saison 91 grâce à une base de données regroupant toutes les équipes et tous les joueurs de cette année-là.

Un jeu de détective privé où il va falloir faire preuve de perspicacité et d'observation pour avancer dans sa quête. Vous serez amené à bavarder pour soutirer quelques indices, observer les pièces et les objets à la découverte de détails, ramasser et utiliser des instruments pour continuer l'aventure.

locale.title: Psychic Detective Series Vol. 4 - Orgel
locale.synopsis: Psychic Detective Series Vol. 4: Orgel is an Adventure game, developed and published by DataWest, which was released in Japan in 1993.
Psychic Detective Series Vol. 4: Orgel es un juego de Aventura, desarrollado y publicado por DataWest, que fue lanzado en Japón en 1993.

locale.title: Puggsy
locale.synopsis: Puggsy is a platform game with a combination of action and puzzle-solving elements. You control the the creature Puggsy, who has crash landed on an alien planet and had his spaceship stolen. Your goal is find the spaceship so you can get off the planet and return home. To do this, you will need to make your way from the start to the exit of numerous levels which take place in a variety of environments. Throughout each level are a variety of objects which you can pick up; on many of the levels you will need to figure out how to use the objects available to you in order to reach the exit. Some objects can used (like a gun or keys), and objects may be thrown, moved around and stacked. Of course, each level will also have a variety of bad guys wandering about which will cost Puggsy one of his lives if he's caught. On your quest there will also be six evil guardians which will need to be defeated before you get your spaceship back!

Puggsy est un jeu de plates-formes sur Mega-CD combinant des séquences d'action et des énigmes. Le joueur contrôle une créature qui a écrasé son vaisseau spatial sur une planète inconnue. Puggsy doit donc explorer les différents environnements et trouver un vaisseau en état de marche pour être en mesure de rentrer chez lui.

Puggsy ist ein Plattformer mit einer Kombination aus Action und Puzzle Elementen. Du steuerst Puggsy, dessen Raumschiff nach einem Absturz auf einem fremden Planeten gestohlen wurde. Dein Ziel ist es das gestohlene Raumschiff wiederzufinden, um zu fliehen und zurück nach hause zu kommen. Um dies zu schaffen musst du dir deinen Weg durch etliche Levels mit verschiedensten Umgebungen bahnen. In jedem Level gibt es verschiedene Objekte zu finden, es liegt an dir herauszufinden wie sie zu nutzen sind um das Ende des Levels zu erreichen. Manche Gegenstände können benutzt (z.B. Waffen und Schlüssel), geworfen, bewegt und gestappelt werden. Natürlich verfügt jedes Level über eine Auswahl von Gegnern, die Puggsy ein Leben kosten, sollten sie ihn erwischen. Auf deiner Reise wirst du auf sechs böse Wächter treffen die besiegt werden müssen bevor du dein Raumschiff zurückerhältst.

locale.title: Quiz Scramble Special
locale.synopsis:
A kooky old doctor has managed to teleport his house clear across to the other side of the planet, with himself and his daughter inside! They're safe, but the teleporter is completely out of power. The teleporter is powered by knowledge, and the only way to recharge it is by communicating with the local wildlife and answering their trivia questions!
Quiz Scramble Special is a comic Japanese-style quiz game. In each zone, there are multiple opponents that will challenge the player to answer questions, and the goal is to answer a certain number correctly before the timer expires. Answering a question incorrectly will cause the player to lose time; when the timer runs out, the player loses a life, and when all lives are gone, it's game over. The game includes both a single-player mode and a two-player cooperative mode. There are also mini-games between stages such as a pie-throwing contest.

locale.title: Racing Aces
locale.synopsis:
The cold war has ended. Big defense contractors, specifically the ones that make fighter planes, organize a new sport. Pilots fly planes of various historical significance in low altitude races for big prizes.
Racing Aces puts you behind the stick of World War 1, World War 2, and modern day fighting aircraft. Each competition is a dogfight as much as a race, and you will have to gun down your enemies to win. The tracks are littered with power up balloons to give you extra weapons and speed.
The races are viewed from a behind-the-plane perspective, and the courses are drawn in 3D using polygons.

Au terme de la Guerre Froide, les constructeurs d'avions de chasse inventent un nouveau sport : les grands prix aériens. Dans Racing Aces, le joueur prend alors les commandes d'avions des Première et Seconde Guerres mondiales ainsi que des chasseurs modernes dans des courses à basse altitude.

locale.title: Radical Rex
locale.synopsis: Radical Rex is a fire-breathing Tyrannosaurus on a skateboard who has to save the dinosaur race under the spell of an evil creature. The game consists of 10 levels set in the prehistoric age. Radical Rex can use a skateboard or glide down hills, jump, kick and breath fire. Tougher enemies need multiple hits and when burnt Rex needs to kick them once more to destroy them or use his scream (hits everything on the screen). While playing Rex collects eggs, health, power-ups for his fire breath and scream refills. Checkpoints are shown as torches that need to be charged with fire. After each level, there is a Bomberman-like sequence to earn an extra continue. Enemies include flies, turtles, toads and all kinds of dinosaurs.

Radical Rex es un Tyrannosaurus que escupe fuego en una patineta y tiene que salvar a la raza de los dinosaurios bajo el hechizo de una criatura malvada. El juego consiste en 10 niveles establecidos en la era prehistórica. Radical Rex puede usar una patineta o deslizarse cuesta abajo, saltar, patear y respirar fuego. Los enemigos más duros necesitan múltiples golpes y cuando los quema, Rex necesita patearlos una vez más para destruirlos o usar su grito (golpea todo en la pantalla). Mientras juegas, Rex recolecta huevos, salud, potenciadores para su aliento de fuego y grita recargas. Los puntos de control se muestran como antorchas que deben cargarse con fuego. Después de cada nivel, hay una secuencia tipo Bomberman para ganar un extra adicional. Los enemigos incluyen moscas, tortugas, sapos y todo tipo de dinosaurios.

Sauvez les dinosaures de l'extinction dans Radical Rex sur Mega-CD. Le sorcier Sethron a lancé un sort aux dinosaures afin qu'ils se battent entre eux jusqu'à leur disparition qui laissera place aux mammifères. Vous contrôlez Rex, un dinosaure qui tente de survivre à l'agressivité de ses copngénères, causée par le sort maléfique. Il peut se déplacer en skate et pour combattre, il crache du feu, donne des coups de poing et pousse un cri qui détruit tout à l'écran.

Radical Rex é um Tiranossauro que espirra fogo em um skate e tem que salvar a corrida de dinossauros sob o feitiço de uma criatura do mal. O jogo consiste em 10 níveis definidos na idade pré-histórica. Radical Rex pode usar um skate ou descer colinas, pular, chutar e espirrar fogo. Os inimigos mais duros precisam de múltiplos ataques e o Rex precisa chutá-los mais uma vez para destruí-los ou usar seu grito (atinge tudo na tela). Ao jogar, Rex coleta ovos, saúde, power-ups para seu espirro de fogo e recargas de gritos. Os pontos de verificação são mostrados como tochas que precisam ser carregadas com fogo. Depois de cada nível, há uma sequência semelhante a Bomberman para ganhar uma continuação extra. Os inimigos incluem moscas, tartarugas, sapos e todos os tipos de dinossauros.

Ranma 1/2: White Orchid Serenade para Mega-CD ofrece una novela de vídeo con una interacción de jugador basada en el cincel de hoja de piedra. Las peleas se llevan a cabo de la misma manera ya que tendrás que elegir entre tres propuestas para esperar superar a tu oponente.

Ranma 1/2 : White Orchid Serenade sur Mega-CD propose un roman vidéo avec une interaction du joueur basée sur le pierre-feuille-ciseau. Les combats se déroulent de la même manière puisque vous aurez à choisir entre trois propositions pour espérer vaincre votre adversaire.

locale.title: RDF: Global Conflict
locale.synopsis: Using a thrilling combination of 3D rendering and explosive combat action, RDF: GLOBAL CONFLICT is an interactive multimedia experience that pushes the Sega CD system to its limits! As a tank commander in the RDF - the elite Rapid Deployment Force - you'll test your battle savvy in a realistic virtual world, from the war-torn countryside of Eastern Europe to Alaska's desolate tundra! But watch your back! An evil genius may pose a threat not only to the team - but to all of mankind!

Utilisant une combinaison palpitante de rendu 3D et d'action de combat explosive, RDF: GLOBAL CONFLICT est une expérience multimédia interactive qui pousse le système Sega CD à ses limites! En tant que commandant de char du RDF (Rapid Deployment Force) - la Force de Déploiement Rapide d'élite - vous testerez votre aptitude au combat dans un monde virtuel réaliste, depuis la campagne déchirée par la guerre en Europe de l'Est jusqu'à la toundra désolée de l'Alaska! Mais attention! Un génie maléfique peut constituer une menace non seulement pour votre unité, mais pour toute l'humanité!

locale.title: Revenge of the Ninja
locale.synopsis:
The story takes place in Japan, you play as Hayate, a young up and coming ninja warrior out to stop the evil of Lougi and his army of ghouls and goblins. You are out to avenge your father's death as well as the emperor and rescue your girlfriend from the clutches of evil and bring an end to the terror visited upon your lands.
Some of the villians you face are Marco Killmore (a half man, half eagle samurai warrior), Zallen (a disgraced samurai warrior out to destroy Hayate), Vengor (a stone shiva-type character), Desfal (a medusa-like woman), Destroyer MPK (a possessed collection of samurai armor) and of course the evil samurai knight himself, Lougi.
To play the game you must press the corresponding buttons on the screen at a certain time, such as pressing left to go left or possibly to avoid a enemies weapon or pressing one of the regular buttons to draw your weapon and attack a certain enemy, much like Dragon's Lair and Space Ace. There are three difficulty levels, each one giving you a certain amount of time to press the buttons, the hardest setting giving you the least amount of time.

L'histoire a lieu au Japon, vous incarnez Hayate, un jeune guerrier ninja en devenir et prêt à arrêter le démon Lougi et son armée de goules et gobelins. Vous souhaitez venger la mort de votre père ainsi que l'empereur et sauver votre petite amie des griffes du démon et mettre fin à la terreur sur vos terres.
Quelques-uns des ennemis que vous affrontez sont Marco Killmore (un demi-homme, demi guerrier samouraï d'aigle), Zallen (un guerrier samouraï déshonoré pour détruire Hayate), Vengor (un caractère de type Shiva de pierre), Desfal (une femme médusée) , Le Destructeur MPK (une collection possédée d'armure samouraï) et bien sûr le chevalier samouraï démon lui-même, Lougi.
Pour jouer au jeu, vous devez réaliser des quick-time events à la manière de Dragon's Lair et Space Ace. Il ya trois niveaux de difficulté, chacun vous donnant un certain temps pour appuyer sur les boutons.

locale.title: Revengers of Vengeance
locale.synopsis: Revengers of Vengeance is a combination of RPG, vertical shooter, and fighting game with a fantasy/anime style. There are ten available characters, each with their own animated backstory and fighting techniques. You must choose a hero and guide their stats to create a formidable fighter capable of taking down the Devil King and freeing the land.

Revengers of Vengeance es una combinación de RPG, tirador vertical y juego de lucha con un estilo de fantasía / anime. Hay diez personajes disponibles, cada uno con su propia historia animada y técnicas de lucha. Debes elegir un héroe y guiar sus estadísticas para crear un luchador formidable capaz de derrotar al Rey Demonio y liberar la tierra.

game.name: Rise Of The Dragon - A Blade Hunter Mystery

locale.title: Rise of the Dragon
locale.synopsis: A futuristic adventure game that borrows graphical elements from Blade Runner (in fact, the title character's name is "Blade Hunter"). You must find out what is killing--by horrible, spontaneous mutation--inhabitants of the city, before it's too late. An oriental cult, drugs, and street informants are among the places you find clues.

Rise of the Dragon est un jeu d'aventure sur Mega-CD. Dans un univers à la Blade Runner, vous enquêtez sur un sombre virus qui fait muter les gens en d'horribles créatures, et les tue. Vous parcourez donc les rues à la recherche d'indices, et vous parlez à un grand nombre de personnes pour faire avancer votre enquête.

locale.title: Road Avenger
locale.synopsis:
Road Avenger dates from the era when interactive movies (e.g. Dragon's Lair, Escape from Cybercity, Time Gal...) with film-quality graphics, but limited player movement, were highly popular.
Players assume the role of an angry cop on a wild ride as he pursues a gang of bikers who killed his wife. Players need to race through oncoming traffic, squeeze between trucks, trash motorcycles and steer through lots of explosions. The only thing needed are quick reflexes to follow the instructions on the screen (with an increasing difficulty) in order to keep the animation going.
The action is shown from a first-person view and fast-paced, while still maintaining smooth and detailed anime drawn graphics.

Road Avenger es un juego de carreras de Mega CD. El título viene en forma de una película anime en la que tienes que presionar en el momento correcto la tecla correcta. Todo es historia de venganza ... Juegas como un joven cuya esposa fue asesinada por una pandilla de conductores. Entonces vas a buscarlos y los cazas hasta su último aliento.

locale.title: Road Avenger
locale.synopsis: Road Avenger est un jeu de courses sur Mega-CD. Le titre se présente sous la forme d'un dessin animé interactif dans lequel vous devez appuyer au bon moment sur la bonne touche. Tout est histoire de vengeance... Vous incarnez un jeune homme dont la compagne a été tuée par un gang de chauffards. Vous partez donc à leur recherche et les traquez jusqu'à leur dernier souffle.

locale.title: Road Rash
locale.synopsis:
This is a remake of the original Road Rash from the early nineties. For those who have not played the original, you are competing against thirteen other "Road Rashers" who will stop at nothing to win 1st, 2nd, or 3rd place. During the race, you have two options available to you: you can either do your best to cross the finish line, or use your weapon to bring the Rashers to the ground if they are giving you trouble. If you do the latter, your opponents will do the same to you during the next race that takes place.
There are five circuits to race: The City, The Peninsula, Pacific Highway, Sierra Nevada, and Napa Valley. Some of these circuits are dangerous. As well as the obstacles and traffic that you encounter along the way, there are also cops driving on bikes who will arrest you if you happen to crash or stop your bike near them, and you have to pay a fine in order to get in any more races. Your bike will be wrecked if you crash too many times, and you have to pay for damages, but the amount you have to pay depends on the bike that you are riding. Once you have completed the first five circuits, you have to race them again another four times - but at a much more difficult level. Manage to win all five circuits on all levels, and you win the Road Rash cup.
There are about five bikes to choose from, which are divided into three groups. Rat, Sport, and Super. You start the first level with a Rat bike, but as you proceed through the levels, it is important to pick bikes from a different bike class.
If you have no plans to win the Road Rash cup, you can choose the game's Thrash mode. The difference between this and the other mode is that there is no money involved (ie: you are not allowed to buy bikes), and you are competing against fourteen opponents. And if you wreck your bike or you get busted, you have to start all over again. Regardless of the mode you pick, you will always start in the last place.
The remake also contains FMV movies that usually depict the outcome of the races, as well as limited songs performed by various recording artists, including Soundgarden, Therapy?, Monster Magnet, and Swervedriver. These songs can be changed on-the-fly via the game's options menu.

Road Rash sur Mega-CD est un jeu de motos qui sort des sentiers battus. Vous disputez des courses sur le continent américain, le plus souvent sur route, où vous avez la possibilité d'infliger les pires crasses à vos opposants. Les victoires vous rapporteront de l'argent qui vous permettra de vous payer une moto plus puissante.

game.name: Dennin Aleste - Nobunaga And His Ninja Force

locale.title: Robo Aleste
locale.synopsis: Overhead Shooter based in Japan. The bloodthirsty Chugoko Warlords of the west have ruled and ravaged the once-supreme Oda Clan. Time to get your revenge. This is an overhead shooter with large bosses and massive power-ups.

Los sanguinarios señores de la guerra Chugoko del oeste han gobernado y devastado al único-supremo Clan Oda. Es hora de vengarse. Shooter vertical basado en Japón, con grandes jefes y potenciadores masivos.nn

locale.title: Robo Aleste
locale.synopsis: Robo Aleste sur Mega-CD est un shoot'em up se déroulant dans le pays du soleil levant. L'histoire débute lorsque le clan Oda, ravagé par les seigneurs de guerre Chugoko, décide de prendre sa revanche grâce à une arme secrète. Le joueur dirige un robot de guerre dans ce shoot'em up où chaque niveau se ponctue par un affrontement face à un boss.

locale.title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms III: Dragon of Destiny
locale.synopsis: Sangokushi III, known as Romance of the Three Kingdoms III: Dragon of Destiny in the west, is the third game in Koei's Sangokushi franchise, a part of their Historical Simulation Series and a sequel to Romance of the Three Kingdoms II. It was first released in 1992 on various home computers and was ported to a variety of other platforms, including to the Sega Mega Drive in 1992 and Sega Mega-CD in 1993.

Sangokushi III, conocido como Romance de los Tres Reinos III: Dragón del Destino en el oeste, es el tercer juego de la franquicia Sangokushi de Koei, una parte de su serie de simulación histórica y una secuela de Romance of the Three Kingdoms II. Fue lanzado por primera vez en 1992 en varias computadoras hogareñas y fue portado a una variedad de otras plataformas, incluyendo a Sega Mega Drive en 1992 y Sega Mega-CD en 1993.

Romance of the Three Kingdoms III : Dragon of Destiny sur Mega-CD est un jeu de stratégie prenant place dans la Chine ancienne. Le but est de conquérir le plus de territoire possible pour devenir le nouvel empereur. Le système de jeu repose essentiellement sur des tableaux et des statistiques ainsi que sur des plans fixes pour la narration.

locale.title: Samurai Shodown
locale.synopsis: In early Japan, a man named Shiro Tokisada Amakusa preaches a heretic religion. Little does anyone know that Amakusa is really a servant of the evil Ambrosia, who took over Amakusa's body. Ambrosia wishes to shroud the world in darkness. Now, choose between 12 warriors (and 3 bonus characters) to fight for the honor of destroying Amakusa, and fulfilling a mission.

En el Japón temprano, un hombre llamado Shiro Tokisada Amakusa predica una religión hereje. Nadie se imagina que Amakusa es realmente un servidor de la malvada Ambrosia, que se hizo cargo del cuerpo de Amakusa. Ambrosia desea envolver al mundo en la oscuridad.nnAhora, elige entre 12 guerreros (y 3 personajes extra) para luchar por el honor de destruir a Amakusa y cumplir una misión.

locale.title: Samurai Shodown
locale.synopsis: Samurai Shodown est un jeu de combat se déroulant au XVIIIème siècle au Japon. Le titre intègre des modifications par rapport aux classiques du genre telles que l'utilisation d'armes blanches, un système de zoom ainsi qu'une jauge POW se remplissant au fil du combat et débloquant des attaques puissantes.

locale.title: Sega Classics Arcade Collection
locale.synopsis:
sold only in a pack-in with the Sega Mega-CD, the collection added Super Monaco GP but was otherwise identical to the 4-in-1, including the version of Revenge of Shinobi included.
Games: Columns Golden Axe Revenge of Shinobi Streets of Rage Super Monaco GP

Se vende solo en un paquete con el Sega Mega-CD, la colección agregó Super Monaco GP, pero era idéntica a la 4-en-1, incluida la versión de Revenge of Shinobi incluida. Juegos: Columnas Golden Axe Venganza de Shinobi Streets of Rage Super Monaco GP
